title: maanamu kaavalenu
sahitya:
mAnamu kAvalenu talli mahiSAsuramardhini abhi



anupallavi



 Anati nI vicciti gAdA ambA nI sannidhi koluva



caraNam



 parula mATa nammi ceDina pAmaruDu nEnani vadalaka sarivArula dUruDa dussangamu cErinadencaka

sthiramugA nI caraNasEva cEyuTakanugrahinci brOvu paramEshvari harikEsha bhAmini guha janani bahu
